[Workhint] collects some information about users wherever they interact with the platform.

If at any time the user wishes to unsubscribe from receiving any future messages, we will provide detailed instructions on canceling the registration at the end of each email, or the user can contact us through the platform or our website.

[Workhint] collects personally identifiable information from users in different ways, including but not limited to times of user visit to the platform, registration on the [Workhint] platform, filling out the application, questionnaire analysis form, and other activities, services, features or resources that may We offer it on our platform.
When you provide personal data in connection with the Payouts feature, Stripe receives that personal data and processes it in accordance with Stripe's Privacy Policy.
Within the time necessary to satisfy the objectives specified in this Privacy Notice, we will maintain your Personal Data, unless a longer retention duration is needed or approved by regulation.
